topic.title: Avellinos Italian Restaurant & Pizzeria
topic.shortdesc: This, although a little further from the main central downtown area, is a hidden gem that everyone should try.

body.p: This restaurant, though it has many delicious dishes, exceeds expectations in one category: pizza. They have so many specialty pizza options, making it possibly difficult but fun to choose! They bake their pizzas to perfection, providing us with a warm, crispy delight. With very generous portions, you will never leave feeling hungry, and instead will most likely leave with a box of tasty leftovers. The overall ambiance of the restaurant is warm and welcoming, making it a nice spot to hang with family and friends. Definitely check it out!
